about_the_game:
Poverty, hunger, sleepless nights on a cold bed - there was nothing but misery in the life of a young street girl named Bun.

She can no longer put up with hopelessness and plans to leave this world and go to Paradise - a distant city where there is no place for suffering. And then one day, without saying a word to anyone, Bun disappears.

You think of nothing better than to start searching the internet. A suspicious website says it's ready to bring her back, but, uh. in exchange for a thousand signatures on the user agreements. Without thinking, you click on them and.... Bun does come back to you, but she's displeased. No wonder why - you pulled her out of Paradise back to your miserable town.

At the same time Felka appears in your life. He's a funny cat-helper, every day calculating the level of your happiness and suggesting ways to increase it.

“What's going on, who is this cat, what did you agree to?” - none of that matters as long as Bun is around. Or... doesn't it?

“How much is Happiness” is a visual novel that shows the truth of our world through the prism of absurdity. Beautiful animated girls and touching music will not leave you indifferent.

Duration of the game: 10-12 hours.

short_description: You lost Bun, a cheerful orphan girl, who was the only joy for you in this cruel world. Tired of the harsh life, she went to Paradise, but you didn't accept it. At great cost, you dragged her back into the place she desperately wanted to escape. “How Much is Happiness” is a story of joy and despair.
